title: Rivalry & interdependence in sibling relationships
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Child development

Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Sibling rivalry
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Brothers and sisters
description: Episode number 14 of Series "The Worlds of childhood". An examination of sibling relationships showing siblings as allies, rivals and caregivers. The effects of birth order are discussed and the ways in which economics may both shape the values of families and define the roles of siblings. Discusses how prenatal behaviour can reduce stress that may accompany the birth of a new sibling.
